@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Transports based the postMessage API, for use in contexts such as

  • Window and Iframe objects (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/postMessage)
  • Workers (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Worker/postMessage)

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
endpoint {Object}
    An endpoint object that implements the postMessage API
@param.description: An endpoint object that implements the postMessage API

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
endpointName {String}
    An optional human-readable name of the endpoint
@param.description: An optional human-readable name of the endpoint

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property endpoint. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #endpoint}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property endpoint. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #endpoint}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property endpoint. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #endpoint}.
